ai-tha-ap479:1.2_0: a corruption of the mind, then the corrupted one.
ai-tha-ap479:1.3_0: took a huge mountain from the sky,
ai-tha-ap479:1.4_0: I stood in a mango grove.
ai-tha-ap479:2.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap479:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap479:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap479:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Girimānanda.
